text: يَوۡمَ هُم بَٰرِزُونَۖ لَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مِنۡهُمۡ شَيۡءٞۚ لِّمَنِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡوَٰحِدِ ٱلۡقَهَّارِ
translation: 16.Usun (ginó kinnuk) woo ayró (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) yambulleenih Yallih foocal, Yallak ken kee ken taamoomiy addunyal abeenik-tu qellitekal.Yalli seecah asaaku reedá miyyi-leeh axcuk?Yalli isi nafsil isih gacisak inki Yallay dirkiseh yani-le axcuk.
